channel.title: Packages on The Median Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Packages on The Median Data Scientist

item.title: Quick meme making in R
item.description:
Source: Create Bart Simpson Blackboard Memes with R knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) library("meme") ## Warning: package 'meme' was built under R version 4.0.3 if (.Platform$OS.type == "windows") { windowsFonts(Comic = windowsFont("Comic Sans MS")) } bart <- "bart_simpson_chalkboard-5157.gif" # source: http://free-extras.com/images/bart_simpson_chalkboard-5157.htm text <- paste(rep("I will not procrastinate 
 in grant writing 
 by making memes in R instead", 2), collapse = "
") meme(bart, text, size = 2, font = "Comic")
